SEARCH
Package org.project.Controller.Control

Class GameOrchestrator

java.lang.Object
org.project.Controller.Control.GameOrchestrator
public class GameOrchestrator extends Object
The GameOrchestrator class is responsible for managing the game orchestration, including players, current game state, game board, selected common goals, point assigner, tile bag, and other game-related information.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GameOrchestrator

      public GameOrchestrator(List<Player> players, GameBoard gameBoard, List<CommonGoal> selectedCGoal, PointAssigner pointAssigner, TileBag tileBag, Game game)
      Constructs a GameOrchestrator object with the specified players, game board, selected common goals, point assigner, tile bag, and game.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players participating in the game
      gameBoard - the game board
      selectedCGoal - the list of selected common goals
      pointAssigner - the point assigner
      tileBag - the tile bag
      game - the game object

    • executeState

      public void executeState() throws InvalidMoveException
      Executes the current game state. Throws an InvalidMoveException if an invalid move is made.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if an invalid move is made
